name: Screech (Funny Monkey Studios)
description:
What is Screech?

Screech is a top down 3/4 view survival shooter. My team - Funny Monkey Studios - are still developing it. You can click arround the map or click on a Screecher to attack it.

Follow the Trello at trello.com/b/8UBfc2rx/screech

Controlls!

Press F to save.

Press R to rotate wall.

Press Escape to enter the pause menu.

To break trees, you have craft an axe, then go to a tree and click with Right and Left mouse button at the same time.

Crafting!

Camp Fire = Log + Candle
Cooked Food = Camp Fire + Food
Cloth = String + String
Metal Ring = Bar + String
Box = Log + string
Crate = Box + Ring
BackPack = Crate + Cloth
Medkit = String + Cloth
Axe = Stick + Rock
Foundation = Log + Log
Wall = Log + Stick
Smelter = Rock + Log
Bar = Smelter + Ore
Candle = Wax + String
Pistol = Bar + Log
Lantern = Bar + Candle

v1.1 Slots For Days!

By: Funny Monkey Studios
